body_content.explanation: moving to the next part, situation, etc. very quickly, often in an exciting way :
examples: Their music features propulsive rhythms that you just have to dance to.
Cinematic blockbusters are often propulsive and full of thrills.

body_content.explanation: pushing or moving something somewhere, often with a lot of force :
examples: When you sail a boat, you are transforming winds into propulsive power.
Their new engine offers the greatest propulsive efficiency of any commercial transport.
